00037 class FMBiGainMgr
00038 {
00039   typedef GNode Vertex;
00040   typedef GBPQueue<Vertex>         VertexPQ;
00041   typedef GBPQueueCursor<Vertex>   VertexPQCur;

00049   {
00050     return init(gain);
00051   }

00058   Vertex* select(FMMoveInfo& moveInfo,
00059                  const std::vector<unsigned char>& part, 
00060                  const BiConstrMgr3& constraintMgr);

00063   int getGain(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo) const
00064   {
00065     return _gainBucket.getKey(_vertexArray[moveInfo._i_v]);
00066   }
00067 
00068   void updateMove(const FMMoveInfo& moveInfo)
00069   {
00070     _gainBucket.detach(_vertexArray[moveInfo._i_v]);
00071   }
00072 
00074   void updateNeighbor(unsigned int, unsigned int i_w, 
00075                       short deltaGain)
00076   {
00077     // Only free vertices are allowed to moved, therefore, only their
00078     // gains are updated.
00079     //&&& if (_cellList[i_w].isVisited()) return;
00080     if (_cellList[i_w].isLocked()) return;
00081     _gainBucket.modifyKeyLIFOBy(_vertexArray[i_w], deltaGain);
00082   }
00083 
00085   void pushBack(unsigned int , const Cell& v, short gain)
00086   {
00087     _gainBucket.pushBack(_vertexArray[&v - _cellList], gain);
00088   }
00089 
00091   void updateGain(const std::vector<unsigned char>& ,
00092                   const std::vector<short>& gain)
00093   {
00094     init(gain);
00095   }
00096

00100   VertexPQCur    _gainBucketCur;      
00101   Vertex* const  _vertexArray;        
00102   Cell* const    _cellList;
